cases7Days.description: Total number of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

incidence7Days.description: Incidence rate of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

date.description: Date corresponding to the data records.

fixedCases7Days.description: Fixed number of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

updatedCases7Days.description: Number of updated COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

adjustedLowerCases7Days.description: Lower bound of adjusted COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

adjustedCases7Days.description: Number of COVID-19 cases adjusted over the past 7 days.

adjustedUpperCases7Days.description: Upper bound of adjusted COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

fixedIncidence7Days.description: Fixed incidence rate of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

updatedIncidence7Days.description: Updated incidence rate of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

adjustedLowerIncidence7Days.description: Lower bound of adjusted incidence rate of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.

adjustedIncidence7Days.description: Incidence rate of COVID-19 cases adjusted over the past 7 days.

adjustedUpperIncidence7Days.description: Upper bound of adjusted incidence rate of COVID-19 cases over the past 7 days.
